doodlejump.gui

Class Gameover

  • java.lang.Object
    • doodlejump.gui.Gameover

  • public class Gameover
extends java.lang.Object
    Instance of the Gameover game state. Shows the gameover screen with options to either write a name for given highscore or another screen with options to replay the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Gameover(Highscore highscore)
      Constructor sets up a new gameover screen with the given image.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void piirra(java.awt.Graphics graphics)
      Method that draws the background image and the text on the screen and also calls the methods to draw different text depending on whether the player made the high score list.
      void piirraIfHighscore(java.awt.Graphics graphics)
      Draws "You Made A New Highscore!" and "Please write your name below:" text if the player made a new high score
      void piirraIfNotHighscore(java.awt.Graphics graphics)
      Draws "Press 'R' to restart the game" and "You did not make a new highscore" text if the player did not make a new high score.
      void removeCharFromName()
      Makes the use of Backspace possible when writing a name
      void reset()
      Resets the player name that gets typed in after a new high score.
      void sendScoreToHighscore()
      Sends the score to the high score class/list
      void setGraphics(java.awt.Graphics g)
      sets the Graphics to the given parameter
      boolean setNewHighscore()
      Method tells whether a new highscore is set
      void setScore(int score) 
      void writeCharToName(java.lang.String letter)
      Adds a new letter to the player names and the draws it on the screen

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Method tells whether a new highscore is set
        Returns:

        Parameters:

      • piirraIfHighscore

        public void piirraIfHighscore(java.awt.Graphics graphics)
        Draws "You Made A New Highscore!" and "Please write your name below:" text if the player made a new high score
        Parameters:
        graphics - for drawing the text on the screen

      • piirraIfNotHighscore

        public void piirraIfNotHighscore(java.awt.Graphics graphics)
        Draws "Press 'R' to restart the game" and "You did not make a new highscore" text if the player did not make a new high score. The game can be restarted by pushing the letter "R" in this screen
        Parameters:
        graphics - for drawing the text on the screen

      • removeCharFromName

        public void removeCharFromName()
        Makes the use of Backspace possible when writing a name
